row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
! Convert to Windows slash :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN ! Begin of Parameter validation :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source directory/file name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target directory/file name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite existing" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDE#
! Validate EXT in variables :SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source directory/file name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target directory/file name" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite existing" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDE#
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 __uc_return(100) :ENDIF
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Copy file '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE#' to '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET#' with overwrite " :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, "flag is '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE#' and exclude pattern is '&UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDE#'") :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WILDCARD :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
java -jar `"&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#file-system-tool.jar`" file FileCopy `"&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_SOURCE#`" `"&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_TARGET#`" &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CP_OVERWRITE# `"&UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDE#`" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
